long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Web pages become like books - simple and concise. Nothing extra, just text and images.
2. Supports searching selected text in Google search engine.
3. Supports translation of selected text using Google translater
4. Allows you to make bookmarks.
5. Listening to the text.
